duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce financial statements, maintain strong financial internal controls, and drive decisions impacting the Finance & Accounting organization.
Manage monthly closing of financial systems and ensure compliance with accounting policies and guidelines.
Develop internal accounting controls and communicate accounting policies and procedures.
Provide leadership and supervision to FP&A, General Ledger Accounting, Bookings, Commissions, Expense processing, and Payroll operations.
Coordinate the implementation of upcoming ERP platform related to the above functions.
Improve business capabilities and processes relating to Accounting operations.
Lead departmental staff through goal setting, guidance, and coaching.
Ensure quality control over financial transactions and reporting.
Recruit, develop, and retain talent that delivers performance excellence.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
